list.name: Default
list.comment: Add some levels with kind of different pattern. The levels are chosen randomly when the game start in the list of levels. I read the number of files in the Levels directory so users can freely add their own levels as they wish. I'll add a level selection box with the choice between level X or Random.

task.summary: Window resizing in function of the monitor, image resizing to use 15*15 square game room, main game loop and loading of level from .txt files.
Basic collision (Need to do the collision check on bomb planting)
Remove useless free space in player images.
Collision detection when planting bomb so the player can't plant on wall;
First working version of the game(Replay after a game do not work atm)

Add some levels with kind of different pattern. The levels are chosen randomly when the game start in the list of levels. I read the number of files in the Levels directory so users can freely add their own levels as they wish. I'll add a level selection box with the choice between level X or Random.

MESSAGE.value: Update Playground frame to test resizing & some things.

Remove useless free space in player images.
Collision detection when planting bomb so the player can't plant on wall;
First working version of the game(Replay after a game do not work atm)

Add some levels with kind of different pattern. The levels are chosen randomly when the game start in the list of levels. I read the number of files in the Levels directory so users can freely add their own levels as they wish. I'll add a level selection box with the choice between level X or Random.
